As an AI language model, I do not have personal experience or feelings. However, I can provide you with some general tips for properly caring for and training a new puppy, which are: 

1. Establish a regular schedule for feeding, walking, and potty breaks to create routine and consistency for your puppy.

2. Socialize your puppy early with other dogs, people, and environments to avoid anxiety and aggression issues later in life.

3. Use positive reinforcement training techniques, such as treats and praise, to build trust and mutual respect with your puppy.

4. Teach basic obedience commands, like "sit," "stay," and "come," to establish good behavior patterns and strengthen the bond between you and your puppy.

5. Provide plenty of exercise and playtime to keep your puppy physically and mentally stimulated, and avoid destructive behavior.

6. Invest in high-quality food, toys, and grooming supplies to promote your puppy's health and well-being.

7. Look out for any signs of illness or distress, and provide prompt medical attention if necessary.

Remember that caring for and training a new puppy requires time, patience, and dedication, but the rewards are immeasurable!
